DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Sent To Steering Committee Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date when the document was sent to the Steering Committee.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Sent To Steering Committee
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to a writing that contains information regarding research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects and that is conveyed or transmitted to a committee to arrange the priorities or order of business.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A writing that contains information.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition: Caused or enabled to go or be conveyed or transmitted.:No Value Exists:A committee to arrange the priorities or order of business for an organization.

Concepts.definition: Cause or enable to go or be conveyed or transmitted.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A committee to arrange the priorities or order of business for an organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
